enhanced_by.method_name: printHelp(PrintWriter, int, String, String, Options, int, int, String)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve printing help information to a PrintWriter with similar setup and formatting requirements.
The appendOption method is used to format individual options, which is a key part of setting up the usage statement.
Both methods involve wrapping text and printing it to a PrintWriter, making printWrapped a good candidate for asserting the output of printUsage.
The renderWrappedText method is used to format text for output, similar to how printUsage formats the usage statement.
